title: Trump orders feds to scour monuments, memorials for DEI language
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has ordered federal agencies to review potential "anti-American'' sentiment being expressed on U.S. monuments and memorials.

title: U of Michigan rolls back DEI amid pressure from Trump admin
shortDescription: University President Santa Ono informed staffers in an email, saying Michigan remains committed to diversity among its students, faculty and staff.

title: Trump aides pledge to preserve Signal chat about attack on Houthis
shortDescription: The nonprofit American Oversight sued Trump Cabinet members to force them to preserve Signal messages that could otherwise be automatically deleted.

title: Lawmakers warn Trump he can't 'pick and choose' what to spend
shortDescription: Trump says he can spend less than Congress appropriates, but the top two members of the Senate Appropriations Committee say otherwise.

title: Trump administration captured top street gang leader. What is MS-13?
shortDescription: A look at the MS-13, a gang which began in Los Angeles but has emerged as a powerful force throughout Central America.

title: Many universities in Trump's crosshairs unclear why they're targeted
shortDescription: Nearly a third of the colleges investigated for antisemitism resolved the complaints or never been subject to such complaints, 31 colleges said.

title: Why is Trump interested in Greenland?
shortDescription: Leaders from both Denmark and Greenland stated their disinterest in joining the U.S. after Trump expressed interest in acquiring the island.

title: Did Trump officials' Signal chat on attack plans break the law?
shortDescription: Pete Hegseth, JD Vance, and other officials discussed military strikes in a Signal chat that included a journalist. Did anyone break the law?

title: Study eyed for Florida property tax changes
shortDescription: Expect an economic impact study as a first step as discussions ramp up about the future of property taxes in Florida.

title: Drugs, guns, booze, bombs: Trump admin to merge DEA and ATF
shortDescription: The possible major shakeup comes amid President Donald Trump's moves to radically streamline the government.

title: Trump says he's withdrawing Stefanik's UN ambassador nomination
shortDescription: New York GOP Rep. Elise Stefanik's career has been in limbo since Trump picked her to join his Cabinet last November.

title: Trump announces 25% auto tariffs | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A busy week for SCOTUS. | Trump administration on the defensive as the fallout continues over chat app Signal being used to discuss war plans.

title: Democrats celebrate after Pennsylvania special election victories
shortDescription: After suffering a blow on the national stage in 2024, states like Pennsylvania are giving Democrats some cause for optimism.

title: World leaders react to Trump's auto tariffs
shortDescription: Canadian, South Korean, German and Japanese world leaders quickly reacted to President Trump's tariffs on cars.

title: Exclusive: Trump administration directs spy satellite agencies to surveil US-Mexico border
shortDescription: The Trump administration has directed two intelligence agencies to train their satellite surveillance capabilities on the U.S.-Mexico border region as part of a sweeping crackdown.

title: SignalGate: Trump says no harm. But there's lots of unanswered questions
shortDescription: The White House tries to move on but Democrats call for Defense Secretary Hegseth's resignation - and ask about possible phone hacks by Russia, India.
